title: (Tánaiste, Minister for Foreign Affairs and Minister for Defence) Order 2024.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Tánaiste, Minister for Foreign Affairs and Minister for Defence) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (tanaiste minister foreign affair minister defence) order 2024

title: (Tánaiste, Minister for Foreign Affairs and Minister for Defence) Order 2024.
heading: 2. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose
text_raw:
2. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose 
address have been deposited at the offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, 
is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Tánaiste and Minister for Foreign 
Affairs with effect from 9 April 2024.
text_norm: 2 person mentioned schedule particular whose address deposited office department taoiseach appointed special adviser tanaiste minister foreign affair effect 9 april 2024

title: (Tánaiste, Minister for Foreign Affairs and Minister for Defence) Order 2024.
heading: 3. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose
text_raw:
3. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose 
address have been deposited at the offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, 
is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Tánaiste and Minister for Defence 
with effect from 9 April 2024. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st October, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [504] 3
text_norm: 3 person mentioned schedule particular whose address deposited office department taoiseach appointed special adviser tanaiste minister defence effect 9 april 2024 notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 1st october 2024 504 3

title: (Tánaiste, Minister for Foreign Affairs and Minister for Defence) Order 2024.
heading: Deirdre Gillane
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Deirdre Gillane 

Pat McParland 

Diarmuid Lynch 

Charlotte Simpson 

Alan Ahearne 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

26 September, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach.
